post.body:
I've just this joined ZeroMe as a campaigner with One versus "Five Eyes" #1vs5i

Journalist Suzie Dawson launched the #1vs5i campaign after several years as a NZ journalist & member of Occupy New Zealand's media team.  

After Edward Snowden's global surveillance disclosures of NSA documents, Suzie began to research & report on the contents & frequently shocking facts revealed by these documents. 

Her journalism lead to Suzie becoming a 'Person of Interest' along with approximately 88 other New Zealand activists.

This resulted in Suzie becoming a targeted individual & the recipient of relentless, intrusive, mentally & emotionally abusive & exhausting covert & overt harassment, & surveillance by New Zealand's Government Communications Security Bureau (GCSB) & other foreign intelligence agencies. The objective seemed to be to galvanise & destroy the core participants of the NZ Occupy Movement.    

As the actions of the intelligence agencies became more extreme & dangerous, Suzie eventually made the decision to leave New Zealand. 

She first moved to Berlin & then Russia, where she was recently provided with temporary asylum. I hope to be able to share news with you about the on-going 1vs5i campaign & share content on 0net & other online spaces. 

Suzie's currently broadcasting weekly live streams analysing the mission-creep of the "Five Eyes" alliance, based on the Snowden documents with intelligence scraped from the Internet & other surveillance apparatus provided to the "Five Eyes" from than 100+ countries. 

At the same time the intelligence agencies & military-industrial complex has acquired a level of power so great, this cabal influences the decisions of numerous Western & International governments, seemingly unquestioned & completely unaccountable.  

I would recommend the following recent YT live streams by Suzie as a good starting point:


Intro video clip: https://peertube.co.uk/videos/watch/a388b4d7-41c2-4309-bfc0-9b761c692158

Part 1 https://peertube.co.uk/videos/watch/5461f1e0-d234-442e-b756-ec6a779df88d

Part2 https://peertube.co.uk/videos/watch/f87f02d9-6792-4c85-bb66-97340acad36b

Part3 https://peertube.co.uk/videos/watch/4baed762-1b64-4cf2-8bb9-9e0c3685cfee

& also a documentary in which Suzie gives an account of the covert harassment & surveillance she experienced before leaving New Zealand 

https://peertube.co.uk/videos/watch/9909d040-b1e9-424d-bdd3-8a0935743456

#1vs5i  - One Versus Five Eyes - Campaign Announcement !

Opening the Five Eyes: Exposing the Spies Episode 6: Deciphering JTRIG

"Courageous Kiwi journalist Suzie Dawson and special guest Lisa Johnson take us to school on the GCHQ's (UK/NSA) infamous JTRIG - Joint Threat Response Intelligence Group that smears, infiltrates and sabotages the lives of targets online! 

The existence of JTRIG was revealed in the Snowden documents and a 50 slide set was published by The Intercept in 2013. This Sunday we break down each of those slides and decipher the methodology employed within."

TONIGHT @ 8PM - E.S.T

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6KNVWWd2pNY

Live stream will be archived on 1vs5i Streams at:

https://peertube.co.uk/video-channels/1vs5i/video-playlists
